text: Notobasis is a genus in the thistle tribe within the Asteraceae. It is native to the Mediterranean region and the Middle East, from Madeira, the Canary Islands, Morocco and Portugal east to Egypt, Iran and Azerbaijan.Cassini, Alexandre Henri Gabriel de. 1825.
